title: 42-year-old man clubbed to death in Ambalangoda
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 42-year-old man was clubbed to death in Galagoda, Ambalangoda on Monday (21)
Police said the a man had killed the son of his wife’s previous marriage following heated exchange.
The suspect has fled the area and investigations are underway to arrest him, Police said.
